actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the joint resolution making further continuing appropriations and providing for productive employment for the fiscal year 1983, and for other purposes.
short_title: Energy Conservation Grants to Local Government and Public Care Institutions Act of 1983

summary.text: Energy Conservation Grants to Local Government and Public Care Institutions Act of 1983- Amends Federal law (which makes further continuing appropriations and provides for productive employment for FY 1983) to include the energy conservation program for buildings owned by units of local government and public care institutions under the Energy Policy and Conservation Act among those programs to which States are permitted to apply designated petroleum violation escrow funds disbursed by the Secretary of Energy.

titles.title: Energy Conservation Grants to Local Government and Public Care Institutions Act of 1983
A bill to amend the joint resolution making further continuing appropriations and providing for productive employment for the fiscal year 1983, and for other purposes.
